ygData.subject: Greetings all! I am a new recruit.
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi! I thought I would take this opportunity to introduce myself. I have characters on 4 servers, so the list may be a little long. ^_^ I ll list them in the
ygData.messageBody:
Hi! I thought I would take this opportunity to introduce myself. I
have characters on 4 servers, so the list may be a little long. ^_^
I'll list them in the order I play the most.

~~Sullon Zek~~ MIKIKY, level 8 (for now), warrior, Iksar, Cazic-
Thule. ~~Tunare~~ PINIDASY, level 8, rogue, Half-elf, Bristlebane.
~~The Tribunal~~ ZINFANDEL, level 42, druid, Wood-elf, Tunare.
MINAKOS, level 17, shadow knight, Iksar, Cazic-Thule. SETSUNA, level
21, warrior, Barbarian, Agnostic. SAUMON, level 17, cleric,
Bristlebane. YANWENIE, level 7, enchanter, High-elf. VILYANAU, level
8, wizard, Sollosek Ro. POMME, level 9, monk, human. ~~Test Server~~
BUMKINS, level 3, warrior, gnome. Troll, shaman.

*whew* Well that's the list. I forgot some info on some characters
since I hardly ever play them. I also only play girls. The guy models
are so ugly and I'm a girl anyway so it makes sense! ^_^

I look forward to being an active member of this group!

-Sylvia
